explains: n. 地下水层，渗透性含水石层
wordGroup: confined aquifer 承压含水层；被封含水层
unconfined aquifer 非承压含水层；不受压含水层；无压含水层

sentences.en: A groundwater reservoir from which water can be extracted is called an aquifer.
sentences.cn: 可以从中抽取水的地下蓄水层被称为含水层。

sentences.en: Extraction of water depends on two properties of the aquifer: porosity and permeability.
sentences.cn: 水的开采取决于含水层的两个性质：孔隙度和渗透性。

sentences.en: Water does not remain immobile in an aquifer but can seep out at springs or leak into other aquifers.
sentences.cn: 水在含水层中并不是静止不动的，而是会从泉水中渗出，或渗入其他含水层。
